params.amountsOut: Value of the final amount out

params.liquidityDecreased: Liquidity amount that was decreased from LP
params.liquidityLeft: Liquidity amount that was left in LP
params.pactDecreased: Amount of PACT that was decreased from LP
params.tokenDecreased: Amount of token that was decreased from LP

params.pactSpent: Amount of PACT that have been added in LP
params.pactToAdd: Amount of PACT that should have been added in LP
params.tokenSpent: Amount of token that have been added in LP
params.tokenToAdd: Amount of token that should have been added in LP

params._amount: amount to be added in lp

params._amountIn: amount of the token to convert
params._amountOutMin: minimum amount of the token to receive
params._exchangePath: exchange path - if empty, it will use the default exchange path
params._tokenAddress: address of the token to convert

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._newTreasury: address of the new Treasury contract

params._newUniswapNFTPositionManager: address of the new UniswapNFTPositionManager contract

params._newUniswapQuoter: address of the new UniswapQuoter contract

params._newUniswapRouter: address of the new UniswapRouter contract

AmountConverted(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Triggered when a token has been set

FeesCollected(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Triggered when the fees of an LP has been decreased

LiquidityDecreased(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Triggered when a LP has been decreased

LiquidityIncreased(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Triggered when a LP has been increased

TransferERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address

convertAmount(address,uint256,uint256,by.notice: Converts an amount of a token to another token

transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers an amount of an ERC20 from this contract to an address
